Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were pretty. When
the leaves change from green to
red, they are more like art to me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's all right for everyone to get
excited when the leaves change...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I prefer to enjoy the
season change by myself somewhere
quiet, so I can think.
<PAGE>
Watching the colors change by myself
or with people is an experience.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think it's really nice that you can 
tell the changing of seasons by the
changing of leaves from green to red.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Come to think of it
the leaves change much like you do,
<MYNAME>, when you are with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You turn red as the leaves when you are
with me, and when you hear and see me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the leaves change colors
everyone gets really excited
but I prefer to watch them change alone.
<PAGE>
But with you, <MYNAME>,
I don't mind sharing the experience.
Would you like to go see them together?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I don't often
extend such an invitation to anyone.
You should be more grateful.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Of course you
will say yes.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For me, the red face you make
when you get embarrassed is much
prettier than any red leaves.
<PAGE>
Yes, just like that...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hahaha, my sweet doesn't have to wait
until fall to turn red, does she?
You are more expressive than any leaves!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You have food stuck to
your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>And just like that...it's gone.
You do take some looking after, huh.
I think that is really cute though.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Everyone was putting out baked potatoes,
so it must be fall. Or do you think
that I am just imagining things?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Not flowers, but dumplings.
Whatever...not that big of a deal.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone likes when the leaves turn
fully red, which is all right, but I
prefer when the leaves are still yellow.
<PAGE>
Thinking about it, you don't really
see a lot of yellow leaves in town.
I would like to see more yellow leaves.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The baked potatoes were so good!
I think I ate too much.
I am so full right now!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves are so pretty!
I think it is so strange and wonderful
that green leaves turn red every year.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you're with someone you really care
about, normal things become special.
Everything is better... How wonderful!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It is really fun to gather up
the fallen fall leaves!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I was so into it
that I think I gathered in too many,
people were staring at me.
<PAGE>
Then, people do say that once
I get into something I forget the
rest of the world and just do it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I will be careful next time
not to gather in so many!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Emma was really captivated
by the fall leaves.
<PAGE>
I wonder if it is true that she
loves anything the color red?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>This is a mystery that
I am definitely going to solve!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What splendid fall leaves.
<PAGE>
I think there are few places with as 
glorious fall leaves as here.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Watching the fall leaves and eating
baked potatoes is the absolute best.
<PAGE>
I think I even ate too much,
which is kind of rare for me.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really 
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always look like you enjoy. Makes
me feel like my cooking is appreciated!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Watching the fall leaves and eating
baked potatoes is fun...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But my favorite thing to do
is to watch the fall leaves while at
the hot springs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wish there was a hot spring around
here where you could go watch the fall
leaves and relax but there really isn't.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>That is really too bad...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For work I got to travel and see the
fall leaves in many places. The ones
here are different, they are special.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>They look almost too
beautiful to be natural.
The splendid red colors move me deeply.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were 
very beautiful, weren't they?
<PAGE>
I often feel when seeing the leaves turn
red a certain emotional stir and a
tightening of the chest in anticipation.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everyone really enjoyed the baked 
potatoes and ate a lot, didn't they?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Seeing such beautiful colors really
gives people an appetite, doesn't it?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Finished for the year, and gathering in 
the fallen leaves, baking potatoes to 
celebrate is really wonderful, I think.
<PAGE>
The fallen leaves themselves
have also finished their years work,
I bet they are happy to be done as well.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I always get very moved by
seeing leaves which were green
until just a few days ago turn red.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Why do leaves
change their color like this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I know the why of it but it
doesn't seem right to talk about the 
science, it feels more emotional...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Rather than thinking too deeply
about such things we should just try
to enjoy the wonderful show, I think.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All of the trees look like they are
on fire with their red leaves.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When it gets to fall
and everything turns red all of a sudden
I always think that is very cool.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The baked potatoes were pretty good.
Maybe it's just me but those were way
better than the ones we make at home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Watching the leaves and eating baked
potatoes Today was a pretty amazing day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>With you by my side
all of this normal stuff was way more 
fun, and beautiful too...pretty weird.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That Toni, while we were making
baked potatoes he put some nuts
or something into the fire as well.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>We told him to take them out and if we
had just left them in they probably
would have blown up in our faces...
<PAGE>
That kid...when grownups are
making a fire they should also
look after their little ones.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What if he had got
burned or something... Talking about it
afterwards with you won't help I guess.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wondered why I had to go with
everyone in town to see some 
stupid leaves...
<PAGE>
But you know, it really was 
a lot better than I thought. I kind of
felt something, deep down, you know.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Such gorgeous fall leaves.
I feel that I could watch them
forever and never get bored.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It is not every day that you can go
outside and eat baked potatoes.
Today was a special day.
<PAGE>
I hope I can join next year as well.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They say that this is the time of
to be preserving your resources...
<PAGE>
I tried to advise Sanjay that we should
use the fallen red leaves
to make carpets in our country...but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>He said that such wonderful
materials should not be used for 
such things.
<PAGE>
I know they are very pretty and special
but that just makes me want to try it
all the more...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The baked potatoes are very good.
I think I like them very much.
<PAGE>
I have seen what goes into making them
at this festival and now believe that
with the right materials I can do it too
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But there is one thing...
cooking them on a big fire by yourself
would not be very fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If the fire spread it would be big
trouble too this is too bad, now I must
wait until the festival next year.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
Everywhere was fall and 
so red and pretty.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The baked potatoes were delicious!
I think it's best to eat baked potatoes
outside with everyone, don't you think?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves are beautiful, when
I was a kid I used to go into the forest
to collect them and bring them home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I bet that many of them are still at
home stuck in the pages of old books. ♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think that the baked potatoes made
with a fire of fallen leaves gives the
potatoes a very delicious flavor!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Even knowing this I do not think that
making them at home would be as good.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All of the fallen fall leaves
look like a big beautiful red
carpet covering the ground. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love baked potatoes so much
I just couldn't stop eating them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I am scared to check
my weight now when I go home.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing all of these pretty leaves,
I think I have come up with some
new and wonderful magic ♪
<PAGE>
When I have it perfected
I will definitely show it to you. ♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Seeing all of the fallen leaves
I do feel a bit sentimental
sometimes...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were cool looking...
<PAGE>
I don't normally like bright colors...
But the incredible red of fall leaves
is something else...I like that a lot.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I love baked potatoes...
But I grabbed them right after 
they were done and burned my hand...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fall leaves were really pretty! The
baked potatoes were extra delicious!
I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
fall really is grand...
And sometimes it is nice to take it
easy outside. Maybe read a bit...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you get tired of reading you can just
relax and watch the colorful trees.
That is really the best...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Piping hot baked potatoes
are really delicious, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I eat really slowly...
It takes a long time to finish even one.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wonderful fall leaves this year.
It is almost too bad that you can 
only see this color leaves in the fall.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think that potatoes baked using
fallen leaves are really delicious.
<PAGE>
I do not normally eat so much at meal
time but today's baked potatoes were
so good I could not stop eating them.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>

picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...okay, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I love watching you eat at home because
you always seem to enjoy it. Makes me
feel like my cooking is appreciated. ♪

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Were you not moved by
the fall leaves swirling
in the river's fierce stream?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Just by resting my
gaze upon it I feel a calm descend.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They say fall is for the artist
but I believe that the fall is
a work of nature's art.
<PAGE>
Perfect reds and other colors of 
the season are not things that
can be replicated by the hand of man...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I find it all so 
beautiful that I cannot stop staring.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I thought that the fall leaves were
perfect and want to see them again.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If only I could find
a handsome prince to share my joy
in time for the next fall festival...
<PAGE>
What do you think?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love baked potatoes so much
and just couldn't stop eating them...
<PAGE>
Everyone was staring at me and asking
where I could possibly fit so 
many potatoes in my small body.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wonder if I ate too much?
I didn't mean to eat so many...
it just kind of happened.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing the red leaves and eating the
baked potatoes...what a wonderful day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>When you are with someone you really
care about normal things become special.
Everything better... How wonderful!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fall leaves were really pretty!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! We should pack a
picnic and go on a date, just the
two of us!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>We can look at the fall leaves
while we have our picnic together!
Isn't that idea romantic?

I ate a bunch of them!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Maybe I ate a few too many...
My stomach feels really full... I wonder
if dinner will fit in there, too...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Oh! But if you made it, <MYNAME>,
then I can eat it all! I love whatever
you make!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
You have some food stuck to your face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...ok, I got it!
Well you were really digging into the
food like there was no tomorrow, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I like to watch you enjoying the food
like that, <MYNAME>♪
